data.title: Remaking Beauty and the Beast by Christina Corcoran — Kickstarter
data.name: Christina Corcoran
data.description: Circa 1800--An animal trainer partners with a prince to avenge her brother and kill his killer, but the suspects keep changing faces...

data.title: Magnificent Kaaboom Combat Models by Zachary T. Whitmore — Kickstarter
data.name: Zachary T. Whitmore

data.title: "Office Trash Can" Art Installation by Randy Liedtke — Kickstarter
data.name: Randy Liedtke
data.description: A conceptual installation for my home office, "Office Trash Can" would represent how the confines of structure can sometimes be good.

data.title: Real Beauty Campaign by Jenna Christine — Kickstarter
data.name: Jenna Christine
data.description: Not every girl is model skinny with perfect features. I'm here to show beauty in everyone and stand up against bullying.

data.title: Theoretical Inquiries into Narrative Time and Memory by Katherine Davis — Kickstarter
data.name: Katherine Davis
data.description: Trip to present at (TEMP)orary: Time & Temporality in Text Conference at the University of Georgia, Athens, March 22, 2014.

data.title: Wild Times by Susan Robb — Kickstarter
data.name: Susan Robb
data.description: Wild Times explores wildness in contemporary life via new media, social engagement, and a 2,650 mile hike.

data.title: Dance Prints - Humans Slicing Through Space by Jesus Chapa-Malacara — Kickstarter
data.name: Jesus Chapa-Malacara
data.description: Get rad photo art while making possible the next round of the ground-breaking art photography by artist Jesús Chapa-Malacara.

data.title: The Congressional Disapproval Rose, Commemorative Plate by Kenneth Pietrobono — Kickstarter
data.name: Kenneth Pietrobono
data.description: 2013 saw the lowest congressional approval rating in history. Commemorate this with an artist plate for you and a member of Congress.

data.title: Phaschromalum: Interactive Light Installation in Kansas City by Ashley Victoria Bellinger — Kickstarter
data.name: Ashley Victoria Bellinger
data.description: An interactive exhibition regarding perception, sensory overload, and color theory using additive light projections.

data.title: True Bible Church! by Nathan Boyer — Kickstarter
data.name: Nathan Boyer
data.description: Become a prankster evangelist! Our crowdsourcing art project spreads faux religious tracts worldwide!

data.title: Poets and Papermakers by jon turner — Kickstarter
data.name: jon turner
data.description: I am working to build a workshop space that will consist of creative writing, papermaking, and book binding for survivors of trauma.

data.title: 5th Anniversary Year / Five Small Fires by POOR DOG GROUP — Kickstarter
data.name: POOR DOG GROUP
data.description: 5th Anniversary Year | FSF is about revolutionaries of an abstract New Age movement stewing over a dark secret that begins to reemerge.

data.title: Baby Tears' Lady Tears U.S. Tour by Katie Shlon — Kickstarter
data.name: Katie Shlon
data.description: Baby Tears' LADY TEARS U.S. Tour is a year-long, site-specific, improvisational music experience exploring place, time, and feeling.

data.title: The Face of Boe Whovian Mardi Gras Parade Contraption by Krewe du Who — Kickstarter
data.name: Krewe du Who
data.description: To build a mobile parade-ready "Face of Booze" contraption inspired by Doctor Who, debuting during Mardi Gras 2014 with Krewe du Who.

data.title: Whistle To Call Your Dog, Not Me by Laura Millington — Kickstarter
data.name: Laura Millington
data.description: Buttons against street harassment - with retail, food service and customer service industry workers especially in mind.
